artist: Painter: After Rembrandt Harmensz. van Rijn; Engraver: Charles Turner; Publisher: W. B. Cooke
description: landscape with a windmill next to a cottage on top of a hill above a river; at right a man rowing a boat; at left two figures beside river; woman and child on path below hill; steep uphill path
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription
below image in black: Painted by Rembrandt   Engraved on Steel by Chas. Turner / REMBRANDT\'S MILL / The Picture in the possession of the Marquess of Lansdowne / GEMS OF ART PLATE I  | on sheet in pencil: 2-275
title: Rembrandt's Mill
